org.apache.flink.runtime.protocols

Interface ExtendedManagementProtocol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JobManagementProtocol, ServiceDiscoveryProtocol, VersionedProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobManager

    public interface ExtendedManagementProtocol
extends JobManagementProtocol
    This protocol provides extended management capabilities beyond the simple JobManagementProtocol. It can be used to retrieve internal scheduling information, the network topology, or profiling information about thread or instance utilization.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getRecentJobs

        List<RecentJobEvent> getRecentJobs()
                                   throws IOException
        Retrieves a list of jobs which have either running or have been started recently.
        Returns:
        a (possibly) empty list of recent jobs
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs while retrieving the job list

      • getEvents

        List<AbstractEvent> getEvents(JobID jobID)
                              throws IOException
        Retrieves the collected events for the job with the given job ID.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job to retrieve the events for
        Returns:
        a (possibly empty) list of events which occurred for that event and which are not older than the query interval
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs while retrieving the list of events

      • getTotalNumberOfRegisteredSlots

        int getTotalNumberOfRegisteredSlots()
                                    throws IOException
        Returns the number of available slots among the registered task managers
        Returns:
        number of available slots
        Throws:
        IOException
